title: Rainbows on the wing
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ian Toohill and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: One of a series that looks at departments of the Royal Melbourne Zoo. This program takes a look at the work of the keeper in charge of the Butterfly Enclosure.
